title: Furniture Decorative Cabinet Knobs Drawer Pulls Handles,Yellow Sunflowers Seamless Pattern Crystal Glass Round Knobs for Wardrobe Dresser Kitchen (4 Pack)
description: Make Your Home A Sparkly New Look With the Help Of Our Unique Cabinets Knobs!

Material: The knob surface is made of crystal glass, and the handle is made of ABS material, which is very durable.The cabinets knobs look cool and elegant with the crystal mushroom design and match any decor.

Size: 1.37 x 1.10 x 0.66 IN/35 x 28 x 17MM. Two lengths of screws are available for you. Short 0.8x2.8CM/0.31x1.1IN, Long 0.8x3.5 cm/0.31x1.37 IN. You can choose the appropriate length according to the thickness of the furniture.

Decorative Appearance: No matter you like cute, funny or art patterns, our store ensure that everyone can find his/her favorite drawer knob.Personalized patterns can make your home look modern and fashionable.
Application: Our knobs are very practical, ideal for drawers, closets, cabinets, dressers, bookcases, jewelry boxes, wardrobes, etc., help you easily open and close drawers.
Package Included: 12 X Drawer Knob Handle, 24 X Stainless Steel Screw (12 short+12 long)
